website_summaries.verdict: Reliable, irritation-free formula that is ideal for sensitive skin. Application is simple and works in less than eight minutes.
pros: Gentle formula specifically designed for upper lip, cheek, and chin hair removal

cons: Some people could be allergic to certain ingredients in formula and reported some burning and peeling after use

customer_reviews.title: GETS THE JOB DONE.
customer_reviews.text: I AM NOT THRILLED WITH THIS PRODUCT BUT IT GETS THE JOB DONE, IF IT'S USED FREQUENTLY. WHEN I USED IT, EVEN THO I LEFT IT ON FOR THE TIME THE PAPERWORK INSTRUCTED, IT BURNED MY FACE AND LEFT ME RED AND SWOLLEN. I USED THE ENCLOSED CREAM TO SOOTHE IT WHEN I WAS DONE, BUT THAT DIDN'T DO THE JOB. I HAD TO USE AQUAFOR FOR SEVERAL DAYS TO RETURN MY SKIN BACK TO NORMAL. DOESN'T GET ALL THE HAIR OFF THE FIRST TIME & MUST REPEAT THE PROCESS IN A DAY OR SO. I FOUND THAT IT ONLY REMOVES THE LONGER HAIR AND ANY SHORT ONES REMAIN. IT'S BETTER THAN USING NO PRODUCT AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: BOB SEILLER
